actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To authorize the acceptance of certain lands for addition to the Antietam National Battlefield in Maryland.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire, by donation only, specified lands for inclusion in the Antietam National Battlefield, Maryland. Revises the boundaries of the battlefield to include the donated lands.

titles.title: To authorize the acceptance of certain lands for addition to the Antietam National Battlefield in Maryland.
